text.jpText:
数多くの名ウマ娘が想いを託し、
後進がそれを引き継いできた
連綿と続く継承の場『三女神像前』――
text.enText:
In front of the three godesses statue, where
generations of Uma Musu entrust their wishes
to the younger generations.

text.jpText:
今日もまた、新たなウマ娘が
想いを継いで走り始める！
text.enText:
Today, too, a new horse girl will start
running to carry on their legacy!
